desc: Sippy Hippy Tea Co. Organic Full Spectrum CBD Tea. Cannabidiol is great for anxiety, stress, pain relief, inflammation, insomnia, relaxation and depression. Nature's purest ingredients delicate flowers, bold spices, and full spectrum hemp-derived CBD. Assortment of black and green teas, herbal teas, cocoa and tea-ware

layout.text: Where organic tea and full spectrum CBD meet to create a unique drinking experience.
